project.name: Arnis
project.description: Generate real life cities in Minecraft. Creates complex and accurate Minecraft Java Edition worlds that reflect real-world geography, topography, and architecture.

tags.description: Used to generate various building structures in Minecraft, including houses, apartments, garages, sheds, hospitals, and other building types.
Used to generate building components and complex building structures.
Used to determine the height of buildings by specifying the number of floors.
Used to determine the starting elevation level for elevated buildings.
Used to determine the color of building walls and materials.
Generates small garage structures with reduced height.
Generates small shed structures, may include bicycle parking.
Generates multi-level parking structures with parking spaces and ramps.
Generates roof-only structures with support pillars.
Generates apartment buildings with increased height.
Generates hospital buildings with increased height.
Generates bridge structures with elevation-aware placement.
Generates residential houses with optional roof generation.
Generates residential buildings with optional roof generation.
Generates generic buildings with optional roof generation.
Used to specify the exact height of buildings, towers, and other structures in meters.
Used to determine the roof type for buildings when roof generation is enabled.
Generates gabled roofs with two sloping sides meeting at a ridge.
Generates hipped roofs where all sides slope downwards to walls.
Generates half-hipped roof variations.
Generates gambrel roof variations.
Generates mansard roof variations.
Generates rounded roof variations.
Generates skillion roofs with single sloping surface.
Generates pyramidal roofs where all sides come to a point at the top.
Generates dome roofs with rounded, hemispherical structure.
Generates onion dome roofs.
Generates cone-shaped roofs.
Generates flat roofs (default roof type).
Used to identify historic castles and forts for appropriate material selection.
Used to identify multi-level parking structures.
Used to identify bicycle parking areas within buildings or structures.
Used to generate roads, paths, and transportation infrastructure. Supports motorways, primary roads, residential streets, footways, pedestrian areas, and various other road types.
Generates wide roads with lane markings and outlines.
Generates wide roads with lane markings and outlines.
Generates medium-width roads.
Generates medium-width roads with lane markings.
Generates standard residential roads.
Generates narrow pedestrian paths using gray concrete.
Generates dirt paths for walking.
Generates staircases and stepped paths.
Generates pedestrian areas and plazas.
Generates rural tracks and farm roads.
Generates service roads and driveways.
Generates exit ramps and slip roads.
Generates exit ramps and slip roads.
Generates street lighting with glowstone.
Generates road crossings and intersections.
Generates bus stop infrastructure.
Generates sand trap areas for vehicles on mountainous roads.
Generates zebra crossings with alternating white and black stripes.
Generates traffic signal infrastructure at crossings.
Used to determine the appropriate block type for surfaces (concrete, asphalt, gravel, etc.).
Generates stone brick surfaces.
Generates stone brick surfaces.
Generates brick surfaces.
Generates wooden plank surfaces.
Generates black concrete surfaces.
Generates gravel surfaces.
Generates gravel surfaces.
Generates grass block surfaces.
Generates dirt surfaces.
Generates dirt surfaces.
Generates dirt surfaces.
Generates sand surfaces.
Generates light gray concrete surfaces.
Generates terracotta surfaces.
Generates red terracotta surfaces.
Generates cobblestone surfaces.

Generates cobblestone surfaces.
Used to determine road width and lane markings.
Generates single-lane roads without center markings.
Generates two-lane roads with center stripe and outline.
Used to identify area features like pedestrian plazas.
Used to generate different ground surfaces and land use patterns including residential areas, farmland, forests, commercial zones, and industrial areas.
Generates grass block surfaces with sparse vegetation.
Generates grass block surfaces with vegetation and occasional trees.
Generates grass block surfaces with grass vegetation.
Generates grass block surfaces with regular tree placement.
Generates grass block surfaces with frequent trees and vegetation.
Generates agricultural areas with farmland blocks, crops, and irrigation.
Generates cemetery areas with podzol, graves, and flowers.
Generates construction sites with coarse dirt, scaffolding, and building materials.
Generates elevated traffic islands with stone block slabs.
Generates residential area surfaces with stone bricks or grass depending on rural/urban setting.
Generates commercial zones with smooth stone surfaces.
Generates educational area surfaces with polished andesite.
Generates religious area surfaces with polished andesite.
Generates industrial areas with cobblestone surfaces.
Generates military areas with gray concrete surfaces.
Generates railway areas with gravel surfaces.
Generates landfill areas with coarse dirt or gravel depending on spoil heap presence.
Generates quarry areas with stone surfaces and resource deposits.
Used to distinguish rural residential areas (grass blocks) from urban ones (stone bricks).
Used to determine material type for landfill areas (generates gravel instead of coarse dirt).
Used to determine material type for landfill areas (generates gravel instead of coarse dirt).
Used to determine ore types in quarry areas.
Generates iron ore blocks in quarries.
Generates coal ore blocks in quarries.
Generates copper ore blocks in quarries.
Generates gold ore blocks in quarries.
Generates clay blocks in quarries.
Generates clay blocks in quarries.
Used to generate natural features including trees, water bodies, wetlands, beaches, and terrain features.
Generates individual trees with various wood types.
Generates water bodies and aquatic areas.
Generates scrubland areas with grass blocks and shrub vegetation.
Generates grassland areas with frequent grass vegetation.
Generates woodland areas with trees and forest vegetation.
Generates heath areas with grass blocks and heath vegetation.
Generates tree rows with frequent trees and vegetation.
Generates sandy terrain with occasional dead bushes.
Generates sand dune terrain.
Generates sandy beach areas.
Generates shallow water areas with sand/gravel base.
Generates reef areas with water blocks.
Generates exposed rock terrain with stone blocks.
Generates rocky terrain with cobblestone blocks.
Generates glacial terrain with packed ice blocks.
Generates muddy terrain with mud blocks.
Generates wetland areas with appropriate vegetation and water features.
Generates mountainous terrain with rock clusters and varied materials.
Generates saddle areas (low points between peaks) with mixed stone and grass.
Generates ridge areas (elevated crests) with predominantly rocky terrain.
Generates decorative shrub areas with oak leaves.
Generates tundra terrain with low vegetation and moss.
Generates hilly terrain with grass and sparse trees.
Generates cliff areas with predominantly stone terrain.
Used to specify the type of wetland for appropriate vegetation generation.
Generates wet meadow areas without standing water.
Generates fen areas without standing water.
Generates reedbed areas with tall grass vegetation.
Generates swamp areas with trees and water.
Generates mangrove areas with trees and water.
Generates bog areas with moss blocks and sparse vegetation.
Generates tidal flat areas without vegetation.
Used to generate various amenities and facilities including parking areas, fountains, waste disposal, shelters, and bicycle parking.
Generates waste disposal facilities using cauldrons.
Generates waste baskets using cauldrons.
Generates vending machines using iron blocks.
Generates ATM machines using iron blocks.
Generates bicycle parking areas with oak planks and roof coverage.
Generates benches using smooth stone and oak logs.
Generates vending facilities using iron blocks.
Generates shelter structures with roofs and fencing.
Generates parking lots with marked spaces, driving lanes, and lighting.
Generates decorative fountains with water and borders.
Used to generate recreational areas including parks, playgrounds, sports facilities, and gardens.
Generates park areas with grass surfaces and recreational features.
Generates nature reserve areas with grass and vegetation.
Generates garden areas with grass and landscaping.

Generates playground areas with play equipment and safety surfaces.

Generates sports pitch areas with appropriate surface materials.
Generates beach resort areas with appropriate surfaces.
Generates dog park areas with appropriate surfaces.
Generates swimming pool areas with water blocks.
Generates swimming areas in larger water bodies.

Generates water park areas with concrete surfaces.
Generates boat launch areas with concrete surfaces.
Generates ice rink areas with packed ice surfaces.
Used to generate rivers, streams, and other waterways with appropriate depths and banks.
Generates large rivers 8 blocks wide and 3 blocks deep.
Generates canals 6 blocks wide and 2 blocks deep.
Generates streams 3 blocks wide and 2 blocks deep.
Generates shipping fairways 12 blocks wide and 3 blocks deep.
Generates water flow lines 2 blocks wide and 1 block deep.
Generates small brooks 2 blocks wide and 1 block deep.
Generates ditches 2 blocks wide and 1 block deep.
Generates drainage channels 1 block wide and 1 block deep.
Used to determine the width of waterways and other linear features.
Used to generate railway infrastructure including tracks and railway facilities.
Proposed railways are ignored during generation.
Abandoned railways are ignored during generation.
Subway railways are ignored during generation.
Railways under construction are ignored during generation.
Razed railways are ignored during generation.
Railway turntables are ignored during generation.
Railways marked as subway are ignored during generation.
Railways in tunnels are ignored during generation.
Used to generate various barriers including fences, walls, and other boundary structures.
Generates bollard barriers using cobblestone walls.
Kerb barriers are ignored during generation.
Generates hedge barriers using oak leaves.
Generates fence barriers with material determined by fence_type.
Generates wall barriers using stone brick walls.
Generates stile barrier openings.
Generates gate barrier openings.
Generates swing gate barrier openings.
Generates lift gate barrier openings.
Generates block barriers using stone blocks.
Generates barrier entrances with air blocks.

Generates railing fences using stone brick walls.
Generates bar fences using stone brick walls.
Generates krest fences using stone brick walls.
Generates chain link fences using stone brick walls.
Generates metal fences using stone brick walls.
Generates wire fences using stone brick walls.
Generates barbed wire fences using stone brick walls.
Generates corrugated metal fences using stone brick walls.
Generates electric fences using stone brick walls.
Generates metal bar fences using stone brick walls.
Generates slatted fences using oak fences.

Generates panel fences using oak fences.
Generates pole fences using oak fences.
Generates concrete fences using stone brick walls.
Generates stone fences using stone brick walls.
Generates glass fences using glass blocks.
Used to determine the material type for various structures.
Uses brick blocks for barrier construction.
Uses light gray concrete blocks for barrier construction.
Uses stone brick walls (representing metal) for barrier construction.
Used to generate man-made structures including towers, chimneys, piers, and other constructed features.
Generates pier structures with oak planks and support pillars.
Generates antenna/radio towers with iron blocks and bars.
Generates chimney structures with brick construction.
Generates water well structures with stone and water.
Generates water tower structures with support legs and tank.
Used to determine tower type for appropriate sizing.
Generates communication towers with standard height.
Generates transmission towers with increased height.
Generates cellular towers with reduced height.
Used to generate airport infrastructure including runways and taxiways.
Used to generate airport area infrastructure.
Used to identify bridge structures (currently in development).
Used to generate tourism-related facilities and information points.
Generates tourism information points and boards.
Used to determine the type of information facility.
Information offices are not generated as simple boards.
Visitor centres are not generated as simple boards.
Used to generate door openings in buildings.
Used to generate building entrances and access points.
Used to generate water areas and aquatic features.
Generates railway sidings using stone brick slabs.
Used to handle multi-level features and underground/elevated structures. Negative values are ignored.
Used to handle building levels and elevation. Negative values are ignored.
